sqlQuery.name: AllDataSources
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ds.name as data_source_name, p.name as project_id FROM ApiDB.DataSource ds, apidbtuning.datasourceattribution dsi, core.projectinfo p WHERE ds.row_project_id = p.project_id and p.name = '@PROJECT_ID@' AND dsi.data_source_id = ds.data_source_id AND dsi.display_category != 'ignore'

sqlQuery.name: ByQuestionName
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ds.name as data_source_name, p.name as project_id FROM ApiDB.DataSource ds, apidbtuning.DataSourceAttribution dsi, ApiDBtuning.DataSourceWdkReference dsr, Core.ProjectInfo p WHERE dsr.target_type = 'question' AND dsr.target_name = $$question_name$$ AND dsr.data_source_id = ds.data_source_id AND ds.data_source_id = dsi.data_source_id AND p.name = '@PROJECT_ID@' and p.project_id = ds.row_project_id AND dsi.display_category != 'ignore'

sqlQuery.name: ByRecordClass
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT ds.name as data_source_name, p.name as project_id FROM ApiDB.DataSource ds, apidbtuning.DataSourceattribution dsi, ApiDBtuning.DataSourceWdkReference dsr, COre.projectinfo p WHERE dsr.target_type IN ('table', 'attribute') --AND dsr.record_type = $$record_class$$ AND ds.data_source_id = dsr.data_source_id AND ds.data_source_id = dsi.data_source_id AND p.name = '@PROJECT_ID@' and p.project_id = ds.row_project_id AND dsi.display_category != 'ignore'
